T02D3746:82a-1: a'arya dzambha la krishna s'a dha nam /
T02D3746:82a-3: 'phags pa dzambha la nag po sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D3746:82a-4: 'phags pa dzambha la la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02D3746:82a-5: /'phags pa dzambha la bsgrub par 'dod pas /
T02D3746:82a-6: yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D3746:82a-7: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i go 'phang thob par byas te /
T02D3746:82a-8: sems can thams cad mtho ris dang thar pa'i bde ba la dgod par bya /
T02D3746:82a-9: de'i ched du dzambha la la chu phul la mchod par bya snyam du sems bskyed la /
T02D3746:82a-10: gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor srung ba ni gzhan dang mthun /
T02D3746:82a-11: rang gi snying gar yi ge aa dkar po 'od
T02D3746:82a-12: zer 'phro ba dang bcas pa yongs su gyur pa
T02D3746:82a-14: de'i steng du yi ge h'um nang nag la la phyi ser ba /
T02D3746:82a-15: 'od zer ser po 'phro ba bsams la /
T02D3746:82a-16: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse dgu pa h'um dang kha dog mtshungs pa bsgom /
T02D3746:82a-17: de'i lte ba'i nang du h'um bsam /
T02D3746:82a-18: h'um de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros shing //
T02D3746:82a-19: ngag tu aom aa zhes brjod pas /
T02D3746:82a-20: phyogs mtshams thams cad nas sems can gyi don byed
T02D3746:82a-21: pa'i au tsushma bsam gyis mi khyab pa spyan drangs
T02D3746:82a-22: nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la /
T02D3746:82a-23: dang cing gus pas phyag 'tshal dngos su 'byor pa
T02D3746:82a-24: dang yid las byung ba'i mchod pa sngon du 'gro
T02D3746:82a-26: tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs pa yin /
T02D3746:82a-27: de nas yang rdo rje h'um /
T02D3746:82a-28: zla ba rnams las 'od 'phros pas snod bcud la
T02D3746:82a-29: phog / de 'od du zhu slar 'od kyi gnas
T02D3746:82a-30: la thim / mdun gyi 'phags pa'ang aom aa zhes
T02D3746:82a-31: brjod pas rdo rje dang h'um dang tha mi dad
T02D3746:82a-32: la thim / du gyur / rang lus kyang 'od
T02D3746:82a-33: du zhu nas rdo rje la sogs pa la thim
T02D3746:82a-34: la thim / du gyur / / de rnams rmi lam sgyu ma ltar bsam /
T02D3746:82b-0: de @82b ye shes kyi tshogs sogs pa yin /
T02D3746:82b-1: rdo rje h'um zla ba autsushma h'um gi 'od zer de lnga po yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D3746:82b-2: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i steng du rnam thos
T02D3746:82b-3: kyi bu sku mdog ser po mgo g-yas su bstan
T02D3746:82b-4: pa / gan rkyal du nyal ba /
T02D3746:82b-5: kha nas rin po che sna tshogs skyugs pa /
T02D3746:82b-6: dbu rgyan la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3746:82b-7: de'i mgo thur du mnan pa /
T02D3746:82b-8: 'od zer phreng ba 'khrug cing 'phro ba'i gdan gyi lte bar /
T02D3746:82b-9: dbang po sbas pa ltar gnag pa'i dza yig yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D3746:82b-10: autsushma byis pa'i gzugs can shin tu nag pa /
T02D3746:82b-13: skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D3746:82b-20: phyag gnyis kyi g-yas pa na khrag gis bkang ba'i
T02D3746:82b-21: thod pa nu ma g-yas pa la brten cing zhal
T02D3746:82b-22: du gsol ba'i tshul gyis bsnams pa /
T02D3746:82b-23: g-yon pa na rin po che sna tshogs skyugs pa'i
T02D3746:82b-24: ne'u le pus mo g-yon gyi steng du bzung ba
T02D3746:82b-25: / zhabs g-yas bskum pas gdan gyi mgo bo mnan pa /
T02D3746:82b-26: g-yon brkyang bas rkang pa mnan pa /
T02D3746:82b-27: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3746:82b-28: gcer bu thor tshugs la klu mtha' yas nag pos dkris pa /
T02D3746:82b-35: rkang pa rnams la rim pa ltar /
T02D3746:82b-42: padma dkar po ste klu chen brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D3746:82b-43: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje rtse dgu pa /
T02D3746:82b-44: de'i lte bar zla ba'i gdan la h'um /
T02D3746:82b-55: yi ge de rnams zla ba'i gdan dang bcas pa'o ;
T02D3746:82b-56: / kha dog gnag cing 'od ser po 'phro ba'o //
T02D3746:82b-57: yi ge de rnams dang thugs ka'i rdo rje'i lte
T02D3746:82b-58: ba'i nang gi h'um zla ba'i gdan rnams las 'od
T02D3746:82b-59: 'phros te / sems can la reg pas thams cad dzambha lar gyur nas yid kyis h'um la bsdu /
T02D3746:83a-1: bsdus te rlung nang du rngubs pas klu chen brgyad dang /
T02D3746:83a-3: ne'u le'i kha nang du song /
T02D3746:83a-4: phyir rgyu bas de rnams kyi kha nas skyugs nas rin po che'i phung po chen po byung /
T02D3746:83a-5: yang zos yang skyugs ba lan mang du bsgom /
T02D3746:83a-6: de rjes su rang gi lag pa g-yas par aom
T02D3746:83a-7: las d'a ki'i gzugs kyi lag pa'i mthil du bam
T02D3746:83a-8: yig las 'od zer 'phros pas skyes bu'i bum pa
T02D3746:83a-9: bzang po'i lag par bsams pa'i bum nang du dzam
T02D3746:83a-18: re re la zla ba'i gdan re'o //
T02D3746:83a-19: de nas zangs gzhong la sogs pa'i nang du rten yod na bzhugs /
T02D3746:83a-20: med na rang dang 'dra ba'i rten mdun du bskyed la /
T02D3746:83a-22: aom aindra ni mu kham bhra ma ri sv'a h'a /
T02D3746:83a-23: zhes pa lan bdun gyis byin gyis brlab /
T02D3746:83a-24: chu khyor ba gang khar blugs par bsams te phul ba khang song bas /
T02D3746:83a-25: khong nang gi dzam gyis ser por gyur snying ga'i
T02D3746:83a-26: h'um la sogs pa'i nus pas bdud rtsir gyur pa
T02D3746:83a-27: slar gyen du log ste rang gi lag pa'i mthil
T02D3746:83a-28: du byung ba / mdun gyi dzambha la'i zhal du phul bar bsam zhing /
T02D3746:83a-29: aom dzlum sv'a h'a zhes pa lan re dang chu
T02D3746:83a-30: khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad rim pa 'di gnyis so
T02D3746:83a-32: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D3746:83a-33: na mo ma ni bha dr'a ya /
T02D3746:83a-34: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02D3746:83a-35: aom dzambha la dza le ndra ye sv'a h'a zhes lan bdun brjod la chu khyor ba bdun dbul /
T02D3746:83a-36: 'di nyid gtor ma'i sngags kyang yin /
T02D3746:83a-37: de nas rten chu nang nas bton te logs su bzhugs /
T02D3746:83a-38: bskyed pa yin na badzra mu:sa gshegs /
T02D3746:83a-41: aom dzambha la dza lendra ye sv'a h'a zhes pa
T02D3746:83a-42: dang na mo ratna tra y'a ya la sogs sngas
T02D3746:83a-44: zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub par the tshom mi dgos gsung /
T02D3746:83a-45: rjes su bdag gzhan thams cad kyi tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba dang /
T02D3746:83a-48: 'dod pa'i don ci dang ci bsams pa thams cad
T02D3746:83a-49: myur du 'grub par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba
T02D3746:83a-50: gdab bsngo ba dang smon lam bya'o //
T02D3746:83b-0: dzambha la nag @83b po'i sgrub thams bsdus pa pan chen sh'akya shr'i'i zhal nas gsungs pa /
T02D3746:83b-1: gnubs lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o //
T02D3746:83b-2: sa brgyad dbang phyug lha yi lha //
T02D3746:83b-3: mgon po 'gro kun phongs pa sel //
T02D3746:83b-4: mi'u thung gzugs can nag po che //
